mapper.update: update face_type_person set control_status='1', update_by=#{userId} where face_type_person.id=#{id}
mapper.select:
select count(1) from face_type_person a inner join zs_person_info as p on a.person_id=p.code inner join ht_xq_info xq on xq.code=a.xq_code and xq.status='0' inner join (select area_id from ht_area where parent_ids like concat('%',#{areaId},'%')) area on area.area_id=xq.sso_regionalcode where a.face_type_code=#{faceTypeCode}
and a.xq_code in (${xqCode})
